Currently, there are two ways in order to install **fixedtimeanalyzR**.

# Installation using devtools via GitHub

Make sure that you have access to the IMBI Heidelberg repository `github.com/imbi-heidelberg`. If you haven't already installed `devtools`, install it via
```{r}
install.packages("devtools")
```
